verbs.description: assessment of india luxury car market 2018 dublin- business wire -nov 2 2018-the assessment of india luxury car market 2018 report [V: has] been added to researchandmarkets com offering the indian luxury car market is set for consistent growth wealthy indians consumers will continue to chase their dream cars in years ahead the average age of luxury car owners is 35 years in the country compared to 43 - 45 years globally this makes the country one of the youngest luxury car market thus a lucrative market for luxury car manufacturers to grow mercedes - benz is the best selling luxury car maker in india followed by bmw and audi volvo group india volkswagen bmw tata motors volvo general motors daimler
